title: Vegetarian Polish cabbage rolls
ingredients: ['1 head white cabbage', '120g buckwheat groats', '3 tablespoons unsalted butter', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '1 onion, chopped', '1 clove garlic, minced', '300g mushrooms, chopped', '1 egg', '1 tablespoon dried marjoram', '2 vegetable stock cubes', 'soy sauce to taste', 'salt and pepper to taste']
